examples.example: 在那个繁忙的路口，总是充满着人们的欢声笑语和对生活的期待。

translate.english: At that busy intersection, there is always full of people's laughter and cheerful voices and expectations for life.

examples.example: 我在这个路口与许久未见的朋友重逢，真是太开心了。

translate.english: I met a friend whom I haven't seen for a long time again at this intersection, and I'm really so happy.

examples.example: 每次路过那个路口，我都会想起曾经和小伙伴们一起玩耍的快乐时光。

translate.english: Every time I pass that intersection, I will think of the happy time when I played with my little friends.
